workouts: 10,000 to 13,000 steps per day, with at least 10 minutes of stepping at a moderate to vigorous intensity

diet.breakfast: 3-4 egg whites, 1 piece of toasted bread, 1 cup low fat milk, fruits
diet.lunch: 1 cup arhar dal + 1 chapatti + 1/2 cup low fat curd + salad

diet.breakfast: Oatmeal with added cinnamon and walnuts. Banana. Skimmed milk

diet.dinner: 4 ounces salmon, 1/2 cup green beans with 1 tablespoon toasted almonds

workouts: Walking- 10 minutes of moderate speed 3 times a day
